Trails.Name: Lost in the Woods (Lower) Uphill Route
Lost in the Woods (Upper) Uphill Route

_inspectorSnowReport.Report: Friday, December 26, 2025 5:00 PM Mammoth and June Mountains will remain closed on Saturday, December 27 to allow mountain operations and patrol teams time to mitigate storm-related hazards across the entire mountain. We have received heavy snowfall and high winds over the last several days. Please do not access the Ski Area during this closure so our teams can work without interference. Although we know our guests are eager to ski and ride, we ask for your cooperation and understanding following this storm cycle. Snowmobile Adventures & Tamarack Cross-Country Ski Center will also remain closed. Woolly's Adventure Summit is expected to be open 10:00AM - 4:00PM.
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReport: Give others space on the slopes
